SSG_Tools.Fonts
Class StrokeFont

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.Fonts.StrokeFont
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileStrokeFont, GreekComplex, GreekSimplex, RomanComplex, RomanDuplex, RomanSimplex, RomanTriplex
public abstract class StrokeFont
extends java.lang.Object

A StrokeFont object encapsulates the low-level data describing how to draw individual characters using a sequence of line segments. Normally applications will not use this directly, but will use the StrokeText class (which in turn uses this class).

CharHeight

public float CharHeight()
Get the nominal height of characters in this font, in font coordinates.

Returns:
The height of an upper case character in this font, from the base to the top of the characters, in font coordinates.

Returns:
